~~~ INPUT ~~~

<html>
 <head>
  <title>Some page</title>
  <meta name=author content=Someone>
  <style>
    body { font-family: arial; }
  </style>

  <meta http-equiv="content-type" content=text/html>
 </head>
 <body bgcolor=black>
  
   <p>This is a pretty simple page.</p>
   
   <p>Bye.</p>
 
 </body>
</html>

~~~ TITLE ~~~

Some page

~~~ PROPERTIES ~~~

title=Some page
meta.author=Someone
body.bgcolor=black
meta.http-equiv.content-type=text/html

~~~ HEAD ~~~

  <meta name=author content=Someone>
  <style>
    body { font-family: arial; }
  </style>

  <meta http-equiv="content-type" content=text/html>
~~~ BODY ~~~
  
   <p>This is a pretty simple page.</p>
   
   <p>Bye.</p>
